data.comment: The match is underway in Braga.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Aderllan Santos is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 4, Aderllan Santos is back on his feet again.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Braga Municipal.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
In the minute 8, Braga's Nuno Sequeira breaks free at Braga Municipal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 10, Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga pushes forward through Ricardo Horta, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
Carlos Mane (Rio Ave) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Braga have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Wenderson Galeno.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It seems as if Wenderson Galeno is unable to continue. Al Musrati replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 20, Rio Ave push upfield but Joao Pinheiro quickly pulls them for offside.
Joao Pinheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Rio Ave drives forward and Carlos Mane gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave's Gelson Dala misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
In the minute 22, Joao Pinheiro awards Braga a goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In the minute 26, Free kick Rio Ave.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Braga's half.
Braga have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Braga.
Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Braga in the half of Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Braga.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Rio Ave.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Rio Ave at Braga Municipal.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Rio Ave are pushing forward but Aderllan Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Braga.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Braga Municipal.
In Braga Rio Ave attack through Carlos Mane. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braga.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Braga.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Braga have got their heads in front thanks to a Ricardo Horta strike.
In the minute 43, That's a fine assist from Andre Castro.
Joao Pinheiro signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Braga's half.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 45, Iuri Medeiros of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Rio Ave.
Nikola Jambor is on a sub for Filipe Augusto for Rio Ave.
In the minute 47, At Braga Municipal, Rio Ave are penalized for being offside.
Free kick Braga.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 52, Joao Pinheiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave push forward at Braga Municipal and Nikola Jambor gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Braga defence.
In Braga Braga drive forward through Iuri Medeiros. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 56, Braga have been awarded a corner by Joao Pinheiro.
Braga are coming forward and Andre Castro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Joao Pinheiro awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Paulinho of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vitor Tormena for Braga has been booked by Joao Pinheiro and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Fransergio extends Braga's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 62, Iuri Medeiros with an assist there.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In the minute 65, Fransergio (Braga) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Braga in the half of Rio Ave.
In Braga, Braga push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
In the minute 72, Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave make their second substitution with Gabrielzinho replacing Gelson Dala.
Ronan Jeronimo is replacing Chico Geraldes for Rio Ave at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Braga.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 79, In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Joao Pinheiro signals a throw-in for Rio Ave, close to Braga's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Braga will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rio Ave.
Aderllan Santos for Rio Ave gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braga.
In the minute 84, Andre Pereira is replacing Diego Lopes for the away team.
Braga to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Carlos Carvalhal (Braga) is making a second substitution, with Rodrigo Gomes replacing Andre Castro.
In the minute 86, Joao Pinheiro signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Braga's half.
Joao Pinheiro signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Rio Ave's Andre Pereira gets in a shot on goal at Braga Municipal. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Braga in the half of Rio Ave.
Great finish from Paulinho to give Braga a 3-0 lead.
Ricardo Horta instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 89, Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's third substitution at Braga Municipal with Joao Novais replacing Fransergio.
The home team replace Ricardo Horta with Abel Ruiz.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-0.
